I think this should be the same code as in `MeteredKeyValueStore` -- also `MeteredTimestampedKeyValueStore` below and `MeteredTimestampedWindowStore`, and `MeteredWindowStore` -- maybe it's worth to extract a shared method that all 5 `MeteredXxxStores` are using? We could add a `MeteredStoreUtils` with a static method?

Just updating each store individually might also be fine.

See my comment above. 

FYI: We have have a bug here. We use `fetch` instead of `get` and users have already asked a question about this on Stackoverflow. KAFKA-8906 documents this.
